name: Case_Created_Notify_Owner
subject: Case Created - Notify Owner
body: Hello {!Case.OwnerFullName}, A new case has been assigned to you. Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Case Type: {!Case.Case_Type__c} Subject: {!Case.Subject} Link: https://{!$Organization.DomainName}/lightning/r/Case/{!Case.Id}/view
plainText: Hello {!Case.OwnerFullName}, a new case has been assigned to you. Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}, Case Type: {!Case.Case_Type__c}, Subject: {!Case.Subject}, Link: https://{!$Organization.DomainName}/lightning/r/Case/{!Case.Id}/view
